node.title: Life After an Abortion: part 1
node.description: For many who have experienced an abortion, life has become a struggle burdened with condemnation, shame, and regret. Dianne Wagner shares about her restless life after an abortion. After dealing with bulimia, cutting and much more distress she was eventually able to find peace through God's grace.  Antoinette Duck joins Dianne as as a child whose mother chose not to abort her. Both of these presenters share their stories to encourage and point people to a Savior who awaits—offering forgiveness, peace, and joy inexpressible.
